# Kalesh
## Overview
---
## Connections
Child: [[Prealat]] ; Kalesh is the eldest child of Prealat.
Child: [[Yenuan]] ; Kalesh is the eldest child of Yenuan.
General Family: [[Hahnu]] ; Hahnu is the uncle of Kalesh.
General Family: [[Nua and Veya]] ; Kalesh, Nua, and Veya are siblings.
